87  class Vector2 {
88  public:
89  double x, y;
90  Vector2() {}
91  Vector2(double x_, double y_) : x(x_), y(y_) {}
92 
93  double len2() { return x * x + y * y; }
94  double len() { return sqrt(len2()); }
95  };
